name.baseName: 铝土矿开采 ; 铝土矿 ; 摇篮

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 铝土矿开采 ; 原铝生产

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Data from IAI 2017, EA 2018 (based on IAI 2017), IAI 2017, AEP 2020, IEA 2020, Brauns 2019

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: “reference scenario” which stands for BR (Brazil), CN (China), GN (Guinea), JM (Jamaica), MX (Mexico for Jamaica), US (USA for Jamaica), and ZA (South Africa for Guinea).

technology.technologicalApplicability: Bauxite mining is the initial step in the production of primary aluminum. The bauxite ore is excavated and processed to extract alumina, which is then used in aluminum smelting. The primary aluminum produced from this process is typically utilized to manufacture a wide range of products across industries including transportation (automotive, aerospace, marine), construction, packaging, electronics, and in the production of an array of consumer goods. The regional references (BR, CN, GN, JM, MX, US, ZA) represent the source locations for the bauxite and the applicability of the process data for these specific regions.
铝土矿的开采是生产初级铝的第一步。铝土矿矿石被开采和加工以提取氧化铝，然后在铝冶炼中使用。从该过程生产的初级铝通常用于制造各行业的广泛产品，包括运输（汽车、航空、海运）、建筑、包装、电子以及消费品生产。区域参考（BR、CN、GN、JM、MX、US、ZA）代表提取铝土矿的源位置以及这些特定地区的过程数据适用性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: For reliable findings, the most recent and representative data were considered. Regional or country-specific data were used when provided in the GaBi© “professional and extension” database (SP 39) or in the literature. If location-specific data were not found, either comparable data for the country or global data were used. For consistency, data from the same source and year were used if available. Due to data availability, the study did not consider some inputs and background processes if they contributed less than 1% to the total input mass. For primary aluminium production, this study used the most recent LCI data from 2015 provided by the International Aluminium Institute (IAI) (International Aluminium Institute, 2017b). IAI data were used because the IAI is an established institute that considers primary aluminium production worldwide and the data were used in studies e.g. from the Aluminium Association and from the European Aluminium Association (Aluminum Association, 2013; European Aluminium Association, 2018). In terms of the LCA data of standardized primary aluminium production, only few uncertainties occurred. Generally, the composition of these data could be fully explained and reconstructed.

为了获得可靠的研究结果，我们考虑了最新的和有代表性的数据。如果 GaBi©"专业和推广 "数据库（SP 39）或文献中提供了特定地区或国家的数据，则使用这些数据。如果找不到特定地区的数据，则使用该国的可比数据或全球数据。为保持一致性，如果有相同来源和年份的数据，则使用相同来源和年份的数据。由于数据的可获得性，如果某些输入和背景过程对总输入质量的贡献小于 1%，则本研究不考虑这些输入和背景过程。对于原铝生产，本研究使用了国际铝业协会（IAI）提供的 2015 年最新 LCI 数据（国际铝业协会，2017b）。之所以使用 IAI 的数据，是因为 IAI 是一个考虑全球原铝生产的成熟机构，其数据已在铝业协会和欧洲铝业协会等研究中使用（铝业协会，2013 年；欧洲铝业协会，2018 年）。就标准化原铝生产的生命周期评估数据而言，不确定因素很少。一般来说，这些数据的组成可以完全解释和重建。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Luthin, A., Backes, J. G. & Traverso, M. A framework to identify environmental-economic trade-offs by combining life cycle assessment and life cycle costing – A case study of aluminium production. Journal of Cleaner Production 321, 128902 (2021).

Luthin, A., Backes, J. G. & Traverso, M. A framework to identify environmental-economic trade-offs by combining life cycle assessment and life cycle costing – A case study of aluminium production. Journal of Cleaner Production 321, 128902 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilising this LCA data, it is important to apply the correct regional or country-specific information to ensure the accuracy of environmental impact assessments. The data provided is representative of specific geographical scenarios referenced and should be applied accordingly. If location-specific data is not available, users should opt for comparable country-level or global data. Consideration should be given to the technological applicability and the consistency of source and year of the data. Data points that constitute less than 1% of the total input mass and have been omitted due to data availability should be noted, as this could affect the comprehensive understanding of the study. Users should also be aware of the low uncertainty associated with this dataset, especially since it is based on the most recent LCI data for primary aluminium production from well-established sources like the IAI.

在使用本生命周期评价数据时，应用正确的区域或国家特定信息对确保环境影响评估的准确性至关重要。所提供的数据代表了特定的地理场景引用，并应相应地使用。如果没有特定位置的数据，则用户应选择可比的国家级或全球数据。应考虑技术适用性及数据来源和年份的一致性。因数据可用性而省略的占总输入质量不足1%的数据点应被注明，因为这可能影响对研究的全面理解。用户还应注意本数据集的不确定性较低，特别是因为它是基于国际铝业协会等知名来源提供的最新初级铝生产LCI数据。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Particulates [kg] ; Dust, unspecific, emission to air
